content.rendered:
Nutrition

Nutrition therapy is a belief that food in its purest form will act as medicine, heal all ailments, and stimulate health and vitality. 

Our therapy emphasizes nutrition as a preventative and corrective treatment of chronic diseases.  

Our ultimate goal is to maximize your wellbeing through individually tailored nutritional and lifestyle changes.

Find the perfect fit

Kidney Disease Nutrition Program

There are various types of kidney disease, including chronic kidney disease (CKD), glomerulonephritis, polycystic kidney disease, and nephrotic syndrome, among others. Regardless of the type of kidney disease a client may have, we can help you achieve your health goals through individualized nutrition therapy. By following a healthy nutrition plan, our clients have been successful in slowing  the progression of kidney disease, reducing the risk of complications, and improving their overall health and wellbeing.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Liver Disease Nutrition Program

Our Program offers personalized nutrition plans and expert guidance to help those with liver disease manage their condition. There are various types of liver disease, including hepatitis, cirrhosis, and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD), among others.Proper nutrition can play a critical role in managing liver disease by reducing inflammation and supporting liver function. We provide our clients a comprehensive approach to managing liver disease through personalized nutrition plans to support liver function, reduce inflammation, manage associated health conditions, and improve their overall quality of life.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Weight Loss Nutrition Program

We believe that weight gain is often rooted in hormonal imbalances, and it’s important to correct the underlying cause through nutrition. Our WeightWell Program focuses on creating healthy habits that are sustainable over the long term, rather than quick-fix solutions that are often unsustainable and ineffective. We provide a comprehensive approach to weight management that addresses the root causes of weight gain through personalized nutrition plans and expert guidance. By addressing individual hormonal imbalances through nutrition, clients can achieve sustainable weight loss and improve their overall health and wellbeing.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Heart Disease Nutrition Program

Heart disease is a broad term that refers to a range of conditions that affect the heart, including coronary artery disease, heart failure, and arrhythmias, among others. We conduct a comprehensive nutrition assessment, create a personalized nutrition plan, and provide ongoing support and monitoring to help clients achieve their health goals. By following a healthy nutrition plan, clients can reduce their risk of further heart-related complications, manage associated health conditions, and improve their overall health and wellbeing.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Autoimmune Disease Nutrition Program

Autoimmune diseases occur when the immune system attacks healthy cells, causing chronic inflammation and various symptoms. Examples of autoimmune diseases include rheumatoid arthritis, lupus, multiple sclerosis, psoriasis,Hashimoto’s thyroiditis, and type 1 diabetes. Our program focuses on identifying and addressing food triggers and nutrient deficiencies that can exacerbate autoimmune symptoms. We use a functional medicine approach to identify underlying root causes of inflammation, and we work closely with clients to create personalized nutrition plans based on latest scientific research and best practices. By addressing the root causes of inflammation and identifying food triggers and nutrient deficiencies, clients can manage their symptoms and improve their overall health and wellbeing.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Cancer Care Program

Our nutrition therapy program for cancer patients provides personalized nutrition plans and support to manage symptoms, maintain strength, and improve quality of life during and after cancer treatment. We work with each patient to create a customized nutrition plan tailored to their cancer type, stage, and treatment plan. Nutrition is critical for reducing side effects during radiation therapy and supporting healing and recovery after surgery. Our program includes education on preventing cancer recurrence and improving overall health. We provide ongoing support to help patients make healthy lifestyle choices and achieve their nutrition goals.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Pregnancy Nutrition Program

Our post/prenatal nutrition therapy program provides personalized nutrition plans and support for women throughout their pregnancy journey. We guide each patient to create a customized plan that addresses their unique needs and the needs of their growing baby. We offer guidance on managing common pregnancy symptoms, supporting healthy fetal growth and development, and postpartum recovery. We prioritize the health of both mother and baby, providing education and guidance on healthy weight management, breastfeeding, and managing pregnancy-related conditions.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Infertility Nutrition Program

Our nutrition therapy program for infertility focuses on addressing the underlying causes of infertility through personalized nutrition plans and support. We work with each patient to identify potential nutritional deficiencies, hormonal imbalances, and lifestyle factors that may be contributing to infertility. We provide education on the best foods to eat to support fertility and address any nutrient deficiencies. Our program also offers guidance on managing conditions that may be impacting fertility, such as polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS) and endometriosis. Our goal is to optimize nutrition and lifestyle factors to support reproductive health and increase the chances of a successful pregnancy.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Diabetes Nutrition Program

Our diabetes nutrition therapy program is designed to support patients with type 1, type 2, and gestational diabetes through personalized nutrition plans and education. Our clinical nutritionist works with each patient to create a customized plan that takes into account their unique needs and goals. We provide education on managing blood sugar levels through proper nutrition and offer guidance on healthy meal planning and portion control. Our program also addresses common complications associated with diabetes, such as cardiovascular disease, kidney disease, and neuropathy. Our goal is to help patients manage their diabetes through nutrition and lifestyle modifications, and improve overall health and well-being.

Book Consultation
Learn More

Pediatric Nutrition Program

Our pediatric nutrition therapy program, Little Nourishers, is designed to support children’s nutritional needs during critical stages of development. Our clinical nutritionist works with parents to create a customized plan that addresses their child’s unique needs, including picky eating, food allergies or sensitivities, and other feeding concerns. We provide education on healthy eating habits, portion control, and nutrient-dense food options that support proper growth and development. Our program also addresses common pediatric conditions such as obesity, gastrointestinal disorders, and attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD). Our goal is to optimize children’s nutrition and health through evidence-based nutrition therapy, helping them reach their full potential.

Book Consultation
Learn More

@graph.name: Nutrition Diet Plan with the Best Nutritionist in India - EchhaJoshi
@graph.description: Nutrition therapy is a belief that food in its purest form will act as medicine, heal all ailments, and stimulate health. We help with healthy, Keto diet plans, etc.

@graph.name: Echha Joshi
@graph.description: As a clinical nutritionist, my passion for personalized nutrition is driven by my unwavering commitment to helping individuals achieve optimal health and wellbeing. With a Postgraduate degree in Clinical Nutritional Sciences and a Master's degree in Clinical Nutrition, I possess an extensive understanding of the impact of different foods and nutrients on the body, and how they can be utilized to prevent and treat a range of health conditions. My approach to nutrition is both precise and tailored to each individual's unique needs. My personalized nutrition counseling takes into account medical history, lifestyle, and personal preferences, providing guidance that is both effective and enjoyable. I am experienced in working with individuals who have a wide range of health concerns, including diabetes, heart disease, and gastrointestinal disorders. Beyond my work in individual counseling, I am committed to promoting the importance of nutrition for overall health and disease prevention. My insights and expertise have been widely recognized and respected in the field, with several publications featuring my contributions. If you are seeking a refined, evidence-based approach to nutrition, I would be honored to connect with you. Together, we can work towards achieving optimal health and wellbeing, unlocking your full potential for a healthier and happier life.
